original_title: Archives of the Fantastic: The Ninth Cosmic Convergence
overview: an evil telepath (Pandora) has stolen the Cosmic Crystal–a powerful mystical artifact–and a heroic master of magik (The Sorcerer) is trying to stop her misuse of its dangerous power. At the same time, a heroine from the future (Skyray) trails her brilliant arch enemy (Dr. Megahertz), who is secretly building a device to harness the power of the Cosmic Crystal. Also, a prankster villain (Yorick) has abandoned criminal pranks in favor of bank robbery, and an auto mechanic-turned-robot-armored-hero (Alloy) wants to know why.  Meanwhile, an ancient, omniscient alien (The Archivist) records Earth’s history from her invisible space station, and watches as the conflict between good and evil throws the fate of the world into jeopardy . . .
tagline: Archives of the Fantastic: The Ninth Cosmic Convergence
title: Archives of the Fantastic: The Ninth Cosmic Convergence
